experience.title: Retail Associate
experience.description: Assisted customers with finding merchandise, organized clothing racks, and operated the cash register. Managed inventory stocking and provided general floor support.

experience.title: Delivery Driver
experience.description: Operated a motor vehicle to transport goods to various residential locations. Followed GPS directions for routing and maintained a log of completed deliveries.

metadata.experience_level: No prior experience or research done for job field.
